name: Crunchy Romaine Salad
author: Georgia Julie
summary: A wonderful combination of flavors in this very easy to prepare salad. A ton of crunch comes from ramen noodles, pecans, and romaine lettuce.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper, to taste
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
directions: Combine sugar, oil, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, and pepper in a jar with a tight-fitting lid; shake until well blended
Break ramen noodles into small pieces, discarding flavor packet
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir noodles and pecans until browned, about 5 minutes
Drain on paper towels and allow to cool
Combine noodles, pecans, broccoli, romaine lettuce, and green onions in a bowl; toss gently
Dress with 1 cup, or more, of dressing; toss to coat
